name: Popcorn Shrimp
author: JK813
summary: Popcorn shrimp make a nice appetizer or side dish for both adults and children. Best served with cocktail sauce.
ingredients: 24  uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Whisk egg and milk in another bowl
Combine bread crumbs, salt, basil, parsley, garlic powder, and onion powder in a third bowl
Gently press shrimp into flour to coat and shake off excess
Dip into egg mixture and press into bread crumbs
Gently toss between your hands so any bread crumbs that haven't stuck can fall away
Place the breaded shrimp onto a plate while breading the rest; do not stack
Deep fry breaded shrimp in preheated oil until golden brown, 3 to 4 minutes
Transfer shrimp to a paper towel-lined platter to drain
